resources.string: Loading failed, please exit the app and reopen the App Manager:
The data is incorrect, please close the app and reopen
The switch is successful. The current usage mode is:
Please enter your new password again
The modification failed, please try again.
The modification is successful and the data is saved successfully.

1. The function of the APP manager is to control the system desktop display or not to display the specific application icon. 

2. The App manager has two usage modes. Click the icon in the upper right corner and select the switching mode in the pop-up menu to switch the usage mode. The mode name displayed in the upper left corner is the current usage mode. 

3. In the user mode, the corresponding switch button is opened. After the operation is completed, the corresponding icon of the application will be hidden, and the application icon will no longer be displayed on the system desktop. Close the corresponding switch button of the app and the app icon will be displayed on the desktop. 

4. Administrator Mode The system desktop displays all application icons, including application icons that have been hidden in application mode. In the administrator mode, the application switch button is turned on or off, the application icon is not hidden, and the user mode is switched after the operation is completed.
The new password and the confirmation new password cannot be empty, please check and re-enter.
The password is wrong, please re-enter the password!
The new password must be 6~16 digits long. Please check and re-enter
Switch usage mode, modify some applications failed.
The new password does not match the new password. Please re-enter
